dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will weigh all options and consider multiple perspectives before making a decision.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and gut feelings to guide their decision-making process.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly express their feelings and emotions, wearing their heart on their sleeve.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions hidden and only share them with trusted individuals or in private settings.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach conflicts with aggression and assertiveness, pushing for their own needs to be met.
Your FarTwin will use diplomacy and tact to resolve conflicts, seeking common ground and compromise.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on new challenges and risks, seeking out excitement and adventure.
Your FarTwin will approach risks with caution, carefully weighing the potential benefits and drawbacks before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and social, seeking out new relationships and connections.
Your FarTwin will prefer to interact with others in smaller, more intimate settings, conserving energy and maintaining alone time.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use logic and analysis to solve problems, breaking them down into manageable components.
Your FarTwin will rely on their imagination and intuition to find innovative solutions to problems.

dimensions.label: Long-Term Goals Focus
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach long-term goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on achieving short-term success, with an emphasis on making progress towards long-term goals.
Your FarTwin will prioritize patience and persistence, taking a slow and steady approach to achieving their long-term objectives.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will primarily learn through visual means, such as watching videos or reading diagrams.
Your FarTwin will prefer to learn through sound, such as listening to lectures or podcasts.
